    • Method Detail

      • createHeader

        public static List<XWPFParagraph> createHeader(XWPFDocument doc,
                                               boolean notOnFirstPage)
        Create header for the document
        Parameters:
        doc - XWPFDOcument on which the header will be created
        notOnFirstPage - Set to true, it eliminates header from first page
        Returns:
        List of 3 @XWPFParagraph, corresponding to left, center and right of document. The left para is left aligned, the center para is center aligned and the right para is right aligned.

      • createFooter

        public static List<XWPFParagraph> createFooter(XWPFDocument doc,
                                               boolean notOnFirstPage)
        Create footer for the document
        Parameters:
        doc - XWPFDOcument on which the footer will be created
        notOnFirstPage - Set to true, it eliminates footer from first page
        Returns:
        List of 3 @XWPFParagraph, corresponding to left, center and right of document. The left para is left aligned, the center para is center aligned and the right para is right aligned.

      • createDialChart

        public static DialChart createDialChart(String title,
                                        String dataName,
                                        double value,
                                        String annotation)
        Creates a dial chart from @value
        Parameters:
        title - of the chart, can be null
        dataName - is the name of data to plot like fuel
        value - to plot on. Must be between 0 to 1, inclusive.
        annotation - can be null, in which case it is auto-generated
        Returns:

      • createPieChart

        public static org.knowm.xchart.internal.chartpart.Chart createPieChart(String title,
                                                                       LinkedHashMap<String,Number> data,
                                                                       Color[] sliceColors)
        Create Pie Chart with default options
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the chart
        data - Chart data, percentages are automatically calculated
        sliceColors - Array of Color for chart legends
        Returns:

      • createPieChart

        public static org.knowm.xchart.internal.chartpart.Chart createPieChart(String title,
                                                                       int width,
                                                                       int height,
                                                                       LinkedHashMap<String,Number> data,
                                                                       Color[] sliceColors)
        Create Pie Chart with auto-generated colors, unless sliceColors are provided.
        Parameters:
        title - of the Chart
        width - of Chart
        height - of Chart
        data - is an ordered list of key value pairs where key is a String and value is a Number
        sliceColors -
        Returns:
